divs: Sighting DetailsI had a very strange road trip one evening on March 18th 2005. I was travelling through Nevada, approaching las vegas from lauphin. It was around 9:30pm I saw a large orange orb directly over the top of me around 10,000 feet rouphly. I pulled over to see what it was. I had no idea, When I got out of the car I saw 6 smaller orbs eject from the larger orb. The larger orb became six orbs all very quickly with a large flash of light, like flares but all the six orbs moved quickly into seperate directions lasted for three or four minutes. I got back in my car and I called everyone I knew. When I was about 2 hours outside of my home. I pulled over on the highway at a rest stop to rest and I got out of the car, around 5:00 am I looked up to see a round shaped orb in the distance around three or four miles away at around 8,000 feet. The orb was a large sphereical shape glowing orange and zipping around as if it were looking for something. I watched it for close to ten minutes until I thought it looked at me, I't started moving toward me, I got a Erie feeling and I got in my car and headed home. I lost sight of the orb when I got to frightened to stay any more. So I got out of there in a hurry. I remeber looking around and adjusting my mirrors to see if it as still following me, I remeber this strange high pitch sound and bright light, lighting up the morning sky thats when I got in the car and left, and thats the last place I saw the orb. A friend told me to tell my story...
